name: Training Soldiers Camp Mission
description: Training Soldiers Camp Mission is a soldier training simulator, in this game a complete soldier training environment is designed with all the necessary training exercises , drills available to train and promote a soldier from soldier to the rank of a commando, we ensure a game addiction as the players will find it a challenge to complete the levels in the given time and move forward to the new level to complete the training of your soldier, it will prove to be the best commando trainer simulator ever, by training some real men of steel as the best metal soldiers with ironic abilities.
